title: Admin creates a new user account with a primary role
description: As an Admin, I want to create a new user account by providing their name, email, and assigning a primary role, so that I can securely grant a new employee the appropriate level of system access to perform their job duties.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational security, user management, and all core master data models.
acceptance_criteria: New user account is created with a selected primary role; System prevents creation with a non-unique email address; System prevents creation with missing required information.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing with >80% coverage; Security verified; Feature documented.
business_value: Enables secure and controlled onboarding of new employees by provisioning role-based access to the system.

title: System Enforces Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for All Data Models
description: As a System Administrator, I want the system to strictly enforce data access and modification rights based on a user's assigned role, so that sensitive company data is protected, operational integrity is maintained, and each user can only perform actions relevant to their job function.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational security, user management, and all core master data models.
acceptance_criteria: Dispatch Manager has operational access only; Finance Officer has financial access only; Driver has restricted, personal access (Record-Level Security).
definition_of_done: Code for security groups, access rights, and record rules is peer-reviewed; Automated integration tests are written to verify key access restrictions; A manual testing cycle has been completed by logging in as each user type.
deployment_notes: Foundational security layer. Must be stable before any other features are deployed.
business_value: Ensures data security and confidentiality, enforces the principle of least privilege, and prevents unauthorized actions.

title: Dispatch Manager creates a new trip
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to create a new trip record by selecting a customer, defining the route, and specifying the material details and rate, so that I can formally initiate a transport job and move it into the planning and assignment phase.
sprint_goal: Complete the core operational trip lifecycle from creation to delivery confirmation via the Driver Portal.
acceptance_criteria: Successful trip creation with valid manual inputs; Attempt to save a trip with missing mandatory fields fails; Customer selection field only shows active customers.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Unit tests for all business logic and validations passing with >80% coverage; E2E tests for the happy path and key error conditions are passing; UI is mobile-responsive.
business_value: Initiates the primary revenue-generating workflow of the system, enabling formal planning, resource allocation, and tracking.

title: Driver logs into the mobile-friendly web portal
description: As a Driver, I want to securely log into a simple, mobile-friendly web portal using my credentials, so that I can access my assigned trips, submit expenses, and update my status while on the go.
sprint_goal: Complete the core operational trip lifecycle from creation to delivery confirmation via the Driver Portal.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login with valid credentials; Login page is responsive on a 360px width device; Login attempt with invalid password shows a generic error.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; E2E automated tests for the login flow are passing; Feature successfully tested on representative iOS and Android devices; Security review confirms adherence to NFRs.
collaboration_required: Odoo backend dev for auth endpoint.
deployment_notes: Entry point for all driver-facing features.
business_value: Enables drivers to access the system, which is the primary entry point for all field-based data capture.

title: Driver submits a trip-related expense with receipt
description: As a Driver, I want to submit a trip-related expense through my mobile web portal by selecting the type, entering the amount, and uploading a receipt, so that I can get reimbursed and the company can track trip costs.
sprint_goal: Implement the full expense management loop and the real-time event/alerting system.
acceptance_criteria: Successful submission of a standard expense (e.g., Toll); Attempt to submit with missing required fields fails with validation error; File upload validation (type, size) works correctly.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Unit tests for validation logic implemented; Integration testing (form -> DB -> S3) completed; UI reviewed for mobile usability.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket and credentials to be configured in the environment.
business_value: Enables accurate and timely tracking of trip expenditures, crucial for profitability and driver reimbursement.

title: Finance Officer generates a GST-compliant e-invoice for a completed trip
description: As a Finance Officer, I want to generate a GST-compliant e-invoice for a completed trip so that I can bill the customer accurately and comply with government tax regulations.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete financial settlement cycle, from invoicing to payment, and enable profitability analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Successful e-invoice generation for a completed trip; Attempt to generate invoice for a non-completed trip is blocked; Asynchronous handling of GSP API timeouts via message queue.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Integration tests with the GSP sandbox API are passing; Generated PDF is verified for compliance; Security review of API key handling is completed.
collaboration_required: DevOps for RabbitMQ and Secrets Manager setup.
external_dependencies: GSP API sandbox availability and documentation.
deployment_notes: Critical compliance feature. High risk due to external API dependency.
business_value: Ensures compliance with GST laws, automates billing, reduces errors, and accelerates the payment cycle.

title: Dispatch Manager views the real-time location of vehicles on a map
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to see a real-time map displaying the current location of all my vehicles that are on 'In-Transit' trips so that I can monitor their progress and proactively identify potential delays.
sprint_goal: Deliver real-time fleet visibility via maps and geofencing, and provide a high-level operational dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Map displays all 'In-Transit' vehicles; Vehicle marker position updates in near real-time (<60s latency); Clicking a marker shows trip details.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Integration testing of the full data pipeline (mock GPS -> Odoo DB -> UI) is completed; Performance requirements for data latency are verified.
deployment_notes: High complexity due to hybrid architecture and real-time data pipeline.
business_value: Provides real-time operational awareness, enabling proactive management of logistics and improved customer service.

title: Dispatch Manager generates and exports operational reports
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to access, filter, and export key operational reports, so that I can analyze the performance of trips, vehicles, and drivers to identify inefficiencies and make data-driven decisions.
sprint_goal: Activate the dashboard alert system and deliver the first suite of operational reports.
acceptance_criteria: Operational reports (Trip, Vehicle Utilization, Driver Performance, Trip Interruption) are available; Reports are filterable by date, customer, etc.; Filtered reports can be exported to Excel and PDF.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Unit tests for data aggregation logic implemented; Performance testing confirms report generation meets NFRs; UI reviewed and approved.
deployment_notes: Requires significant test data for performance validation.
business_value: Enables data-driven decision-making to improve operational efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance resource management.

title: Admin configures system-wide settings
description: As an Admin, I want a centralized settings page to configure system-wide parameters, such as session timeout, expense policies, and alert intervals, so that I can customize the application's behavior to match our company's security and operational policies without requiring code changes.
sprint_goal: Complete the advanced financial reporting suite and provide system configuration options.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can access the TMS settings page; Admin can edit and save settings (e.g., Session Timeout); System rejects invalid input for numeric fields; Non-Admin user is denied access.
definition_of_done: Code peer-reviewed; Unit tests for settings model logic and validation implemented; Security requirements validated; Integration test confirms another module can correctly read a setting.
deployment_notes: Foundational for system customization and security policies.
business_value: Enables the business to adapt the system to changing policies without developer intervention, enhancing security and operational efficiency.

title: Admin executes a one-time data migration from the legacy system
description: As an Admin, I want to execute a well-defined process with supporting scripts to migrate key master data and open financial transactions from our legacy system into the new TMS, so that the system is populated with essential business data at go-live.
sprint_goal: Finalize all reporting and execute and validate the data migration, preparing for go-live.
acceptance_criteria: Successful migration of active customer master data; Migration script handles records with missing mandatory data by logging errors and skipping; Migration process is idempotent and prevents duplicate records.
definition_of_done: Migration scripts are code-reviewed; A full end-to-end migration dry-run has been successfully completed in staging; A detailed runbook for executing the migration in production is created and peer-reviewed.
external_dependencies: Legacy data extract availability and quality.
deployment_notes: High-risk activity performed during a planned cutover window. Depends heavily on legacy data quality (RISK-003).
business_value: Enables business continuity by populating the new TMS with critical operational data, avoiding data loss and manual re-entry.
